courses.title: Complete Guitar Mastery for Beginners
courses.description: Learn guitar from scratch with comprehensive lessons covering chords, strumming patterns, and your first songs. Perfect for absolute beginners.

courses.title: Piano Fundamentals: Classical to Modern
courses.description: Master piano basics through classical techniques and modern applications. Covers scales, arpeggios, and popular song arrangements.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation Techniques
courses.description: Unlock the secrets of jazz improvisation with advanced chord progressions, scales, and performance techniques for intermediate musicians.

courses.title: Drum Beats and Rhythms Masterclass
courses.description: From basic beats to complex polyrhythms, learn drumming fundamentals and advanced techniques across multiple genres.

courses.title: Vocal Training: Finding Your Voice
courses.description: Develop proper breathing, pitch control, and vocal range through proven techniques used by professional singers.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production with Ableton
courses.description: Create professional electronic tracks using Ableton Live. Learn synthesis, sampling, and mixing techniques.

courses.title: Classical Violin for All Ages
courses.description: Traditional violin instruction focusing on proper posture, bowing technique, and classical repertoire.

courses.title: Bass Guitar Grooves and Techniques
courses.description: Master the low end with comprehensive bass guitar instruction covering slapping, tapping, and groove patterns.

courses.title: Songwriting and Composition
courses.description: Learn to write compelling songs with melody, harmony, and lyrical techniques used by hit songwriters.

courses.title: Flute Fundamentals and Beyond
courses.description: Comprehensive flute instruction from beginner to advanced, including classical and contemporary pieces.

courses.title: Hip-Hop Production Essentials
courses.description: Learn to create authentic hip-hop beats using sampling techniques, drum programming, and mixing fundamentals.

courses.title: Acoustic Fingerpicking Guitar
courses.description: Master fingerpicking patterns and techniques for beautiful acoustic guitar arrangements and solos.

courses.title: Music Theory for Everyone
courses.description: Understand the building blocks of music with comprehensive theory lessons applicable to any instrument.

courses.title: Saxophone Jazz and Blues
courses.description: Express yourself through saxophone with jazz and blues techniques, improvisation, and classic repertoire.

courses.title: Ukulele for Beginners
courses.description: Start your musical journey with the ukulele. Learn chords, strumming patterns, and popular songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Improvisation
courses.description: Take your piano skills to the next level with advanced improvisation techniques and jazz harmony.

courses.title: Trumpet Classical and Jazz
courses.description: Master trumpet technique through classical training and jazz performance skills.

courses.title: Cello from Scratch
courses.description: Begin your cello journey with proper technique, bowing, and beautiful classical pieces.

courses.title: Rock Guitar Solos and Riffs
courses.description: Learn iconic rock guitar solos and riffs from the masters. Covers technique, tone, and style.

courses.title: Harmonica Blues and Folk

courses.title: DJ Mixing and Scratching

courses.title: Opera Vocal Techniques

courses.title: Banjo Bluegrass Fundamentals

courses.title: Recording Studio Techniques

courses.title: Clarinet Classical Methods

courses.title: Percussion World Rhythms

courses.title: Harp for Beginners

courses.title: Xylophone and Marimba
